text:
Champions League
OL-Benfica: which channel and what time?
Olympique Lyonnais receives Benfica on behalf of the fourth day of the Champions League. A meeting broadcast live on French television this Tuesday, November 5, 2019. On which channel and at what time? Answer in this article.
05 Nov 2019, 06:00 by Florian Sermaise



Olympique Lyonnais plays big! This Tuesday night, on the occasion of the fourth day of the Champions League, the Gones have an appointment with their executioner of the previous episode: Benfica Lisbon. After a draw against Zenith Saint-Petersburg (1-1), then a victory on the field of RB Leipzig (2-0), the OL has indeed fallen for the first time from its European campaign there is two weeks, in Portugal (1-2). A defeat which, moreover, totally revived the suspense in the group G. At the time of attacking the return phase, Rudi Garcia and his men point in the third place of the hen with 4 points, tied with the Zenith and with only one unit ahead of his evening opponent. A success at Groupama Stadium could almost exclude the Lusitanian club.








Group G calendar




Lucas Tousart beaten by Franco Cervi in the first leg (2-1) +14 üì∑Credit Photo - Icon Sport

1st day - September 17th

18h55: Lyon 1-1 Zenith
9 pm: Benfica 1-2 RB Leipzig

2nd day - October 2nd

9 pm: RB Leipzig 0-2 Lyon
9 pm: Zenith 3-1 Benfica

3rd day - 23rd of October

18h55: RB Leipzig 2-1 Zenith
21 hours: Benfica 2-1 Lyon

4th day - November 5th

18h55: Zenith - RB Leipzig
9 pm: Lyon - Benfica

5th day - 27th November

18h55: Zenith - Lyon
9 pm: RB Leipzig - Benfica

6th day - December 10th

9 pm: Benfica - Zenith
9 pm: Lyon - RB Leipzig

The classification of group G




Alex Grimaldo is also ahead of Maxwell Cornet + 14 üì∑Credit Photo - Icon Sport

1- RB Leipzig (6 points, 0)
2- Zenith St. Petersburg (4 points, 1)
3- Lyon (4 points, 1)
4- Benfica (3 points, -2)

The first two of the group are qualified in the round of 16. The third is donated to the Europa League. The last definitely leaves the European Cup for this season.
OL-Benfica on television




Houssem Aouar wrestling with Gedson Fernandes + 14 üì∑Credit Photo - Icon Sport

This match of the 4th day of the Champions League between Olympique Lyonnais and Benfica Lisbon is to be followed live on French television this Tuesday, November 5, 2019, from 21:00 on the RMC Sport 1 channel.
